description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in pfSense CE and pfSense Plus (pfSense CE software versions 2.5.2 and earlier, and pfSense Plus software versions 21.05 and earlier) allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via a malicious URL.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: pfSense CE software versions 2.5.2 and earlier, and pfSense Plus software versions 21.05 and earlier
